item.title: Paul add a quote by Marshall McLuhan
item.description: "the only people who have proof of their sanity are those who have been discharged from mental institutions" -- Marshall McLuhan

item.title: Paul add a quote by John Milton
item.description: "Better to reign in Hell, than to serve in Heaven." -- John Milton

item.title: Paul add a quote by John Maynard Keynes
item.description: "when the facts change, I change my mind - what do you do, Sir?" -- John Maynard Keynes

item.title: Paul add a quote by Louis Brandeis
item.description:
"If there be time to expose through discussion the falsehood and fallacies, to avert the evil by the processes of education, the remedy to be applied is more speech, not enforced silence."
[<i>Whitney v. California</i>, 274 U.S. 357 (1927)]" -- Louis Brandeis

item.title: Paul add a quote by Thomas Gray
item.description: "Full many a gem of purest ray serene The dark unfathom'd caves of ocean bear: Full many a flower is born to blush unseen, And waste its sweetness on the desert air." -- Thomas Gray

item.title: Paul add a quote by Cole Porter
item.description: "a college education I would never propose - a bachelor's degree won't even keep you in clothes" -- Cole Porter

item.title: Paul add a quote by Phil Ochs
item.description: "success is an enemy to the losers of the day" -- Phil Ochs

item.title: Paul add a quote by John Lennon
Paul add a quote by H.G. Wells
item.description: "We all have our time machines, don't we. Those that take us back are memories...And those that carry us forward, are dreams." -- H.G. Wells

item.title: Paul add a quote by Paul Levinson
item.description: "what I call the “first love syndrome,” found not only in what we most like in online systems but in movies, television shows, and novels.The principle is that we most love what we first experience" -- Paul Levinson
